thi-ap1:5.3: Sattaratanamahesī → sattaratanassa mahesī (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1)
thi-ap1:6.1: Idha sañcitakusalā → tattha sañcitaṁ kusalaṁ (sya1ed, sya2ed); idha sañcitā kusalaṁ (pts-vp-pli1)
thi-ap1:18.2: Tammūlaṁ sāsane khamaṁ → tammūlaṁ sā ca sāsane khanti (bj, mr); taṁ mūlaṁ sā ca sāsane khanti (pts-vp-pli1)
